languages.text: В безмолвии ушла когорта Оптикона-22 во тьму мануфакторума, и броня их была выкрашена черным хромом. Спустя часы до нас донеслись ужасающие звуки битвы, а затем в недрах священных цехов родилась вспышка. Бросившиеся вперед Ангелы Императора обнаружили искалеченного, но еще живого Крика скверны и обратили в бегство. Кровавая клешня чудовища, оторванная жутким взрывом, была поднесена Лорд-капитану как трофей. Тело Оптикона-22 так и не было найдено — взрыв атомного заряда, что нес на себе отважный техножрец, распылил его. Такова была высокая цена за тяжкую и унизительную рану, нанесенную нечестивому чемпиону еретиков. Мы повторяли имя отважного воителя Кода в молитвах.

Opticon-22 and his cohort, their armour painted with black chrome, marched into the darkness of the manufactorum in silence. Hours later, we heard chilling sounds of combat, and then a flash erupted from the depths of the sacred workshops. The Emperor's Angels charged forth and found Doomscream there, crippled but still alive, and routed the fiend. His bloodied pincer, ripped off by the devastating explosion, was presented to the Lord Captain as a trophy. The body of Opticon-22 was never found — it was disintegrated by the atomic charge he carried into battle. Such was the high price for the grave and humiliating wound that he and his tech-comrades inflicted upon the unholy champion of the heretics. We chanted the name of the brave warrior of the Code in our prayers.
languages.original_text: В безмолвии ушла когорта Оптикона-22 во тьму мануфакторума, и броня их была выкрашена черным хромом. Спустя часы до нас донеслись ужасающие звуки битвы, а затем в недрах священных цехов родилась вспышка. Бросившиеся вперед Ангелы Императора обнаружили искалеченного, но еще живого Крика скверны и обратили в бегство. Кровавая клешня чудовища, оторванная жутким взрывом, была поднесена Лорд-капитану как трофей. Тело Оптикона-22 так и не было найдено — взрыв атомного заряда, что нес на себе отважный техножрец, распылил его. Такова была высокая цена за тяжкую и унизительную рану, нанесенную нечестивому чемпиону еретиков. Мы повторяли имя отважного воителя Кода в молитвах.

traits.locale_text: Opticon-22 and his troop, their armour painted with black chrome, marched into the darkness of the manufactorum in silence. Hours later, we heard chilling sounds of combat, and then a flash erupted from the depths of the sacred workshops. When we finally found the courage to investigate the field of battle, we discovered nothing but mangled remains and Balescream's bloodied pincer that was ripped off by a devastating explosion. The body of Opticon-22 was never found — it was vaporised by the atomic charge he carried into battle. Such was the high price for the grave and humiliating wound that he and his tech-comrades inflicted upon the unholy champion of the heretics. We chanted the name of the brave warrior of the Code in our prayers.

Hours later, we heard chilling sounds of combat, and then a flash erupted from the depths of the sacred workshops. When we finally found the courage to investigate the field of battle, we discovered nothing but mangled remains and Balescream's bloodied pincer that was ripped off by a devastating explosion. Such was the high price for the grave and humiliating wound that he and his tech-comrades inflicted upon the unholy champion of the heretics. We chanted the name of the brave warrior of the Code in our prayers.

Hours later, we heard chilling sounds of combat, and then a flash erupted from the depths of the sacred workshops. The Emperor's Angels charged forth and found Doomscream there, crippled but still alive, and routed the fiend. languages.text: 奥普蒂孔22号和他的队员盔甲上镀满了黑色的铬层，静静地进入了制造工厂的黑暗之中。几个小时之后，我们听到了令人不寒而栗的战斗声。在那之后，一道闪光从神圣的车间深处爆发出来。帝皇的天使冲了上去，找到了身受重伤的灾啸，击溃了那个恶魔。灾啸的利爪上沾满了血迹，在爆炸中被扯了下来，之后作为战利品献给了舰长大人。至于奥普蒂孔22号的遗体，再也没有人能找到了——他在战斗中引爆了随身携带的原子弹，他的身体在烈焰中化为了齑粉。为了削弱异端分子的邪恶勇士，为了让这位强敌身受重伤，奥普蒂孔22号和他的技术战友付出了惨重的代价。我们一边祈祷着，一边呼唤着这位英勇贤者的名字。
languages.original_text: Opticon-22 and his cohort, their armour painted with black chrome, marched into the darkness of the manufactorum in silence. Hours later, we heard chilling sounds of combat, and then a flash erupted from the depths of the sacred workshops. The Emperor's Angels charged forth and found Doomscream there, crippled but still alive, and routed the fiend. His bloodied pincer, ripped off by the devastating explosion, was presented to the Lord Captain as a trophy. The body of Opticon-22 was never found — it was disintegrated by the atomic charge he carried into battle. Such was the high price for the grave and humiliating wound that he and his tech-comrades inflicted upon the unholy champion of the heretics. We chanted the name of the brave warrior of the Code in our prayers.

traits.locale_text: 奥普蒂孔22号和他的队员盔甲上镀满了黑色的铬层，静静地进入了制造工厂的黑暗之中。几个小时之后，我们听到了令人不寒而栗的战斗声。在那之后，一道闪光从神圣的车间深处爆发出来。当我们终于鼓起勇气，对战场进行调查时，我们只找到了许多残缺不全的遗体，还有灾啸沾满了血迹的利爪，是在那场爆炸中被炸下来的。至于奥普蒂孔22号的遗体，再也没有人能找到了——他在战斗中引爆了随身携带的原子弹，他的身体在烈焰中化为了齑粉。为了削弱异端分子的邪恶勇士，为了让这位强敌身受重伤，奥普蒂孔22号和他的技术战友付出了惨重的代价。我们一边祈祷着，一边呼唤着这位英勇贤者的名字。

languages.text: Opticon-22 et ses hommes, dont les armures étaient peintes de chrome noir, se sont enfoncés en silence dans les ténèbres du manufactorum. Au bout de quelques heures, nous avons entendu le bruit glaçant d'un combat, puis un éclair aveuglant a jailli des profondeurs des ateliers sacrés. Une fois sur place, les anges de l'Empereur sont tombés nez à nez avec le Fléau Hurlant, estropié mais toujours vivant, et ont achevé le monstre, dont la pince ensanglantée, arrachée par l'explosion dévastatrice, a ensuite été offerte {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine} en guise de trophée. Personne n'a jamais retrouvé le corps d'Opticon-22, qui semble avoir été désintégré par la charge atomique qu'il avait emportée dans la bataille. Tel aura été le prix à payer pour la grave et humiliante blessure infligée par ses technoconfrères et lui-même au champion impie des hérétiques. Nous avons acclamé le nom de ce courageux guerrier du Code dans nos prières.
languages.original_text: Opticon-22 and his cohort, their armour painted with black chrome, marched into the darkness of the manufactorum in silence. Hours later, we heard chilling sounds of combat, and then a flash erupted from the depths of the sacred workshops. The Emperor's Angels charged forth and found Doomscream there, crippled but still alive, and routed the fiend. His bloodied pincer, ripped off by the devastating explosion, was presented to the Lord Captain as a trophy. The body of Opticon-22 was never found — it was disintegrated by the atomic charge he carried into battle. Such was the high price for the grave and humiliating wound that he and his tech-comrades inflicted upon the unholy champion of the heretics. We chanted the name of the brave warrior of the Code in our prayers.

traits.locale_text: Opticon-22 et ses hommes, dont les armures étaient peintes de chrome noir, se sont enfoncés en silence dans les ténèbres du manufactorum. Au bout de quelques heures, nous avons entendu le bruit glaçant d'un combat, puis un éclair aveuglant a jailli des profondeurs des ateliers sacrés. Lorsque nous avons enfin trouvé le courage d'aller examiner le champ de bataille, nous n'avons découvert que des corps broyés et la pince ensanglantée du Fléau Hurlant, arrachée par une explosion dévastatrice. Personne n'a jamais retrouvé le corps d'Opticon-22, qui semble avoir été désintégré par la charge atomique qu'il avait emportée dans la bataille. Tel aura été le prix à payer pour la grave et humiliante blessure infligée par ses technoconfrères et lui-même au champion impie des hérétiques. Nous avons acclamé le nom de ce courageux guerrier du Code dans nos prières.

languages.text: オプティコン-22とその一行は、黒いクロームメッキで塗装した鎧を身にまとい、静まり返る暗い聖工場へと進軍した。数時間後、戦闘による恐ろしい音が聞こえてきて、聖なる物作りの建物の奥で閃光が走った。突撃した皇帝の天使達は、そこでまだ息はあるが動けない状態のドゥームスクリームを発見して、その悪党の息の根を止める。強烈な爆発でバラバラになった男の血まみれのハサミは、戦利品としてロード・キャプテンに贈られた。オプティコン-22の遺体は見つからなかった―戦場に持ち込んだ原子爆弾の爆薬のせいで、細かく分解されてしまったのだ。彼と彼の技術仲間たちが、異端者たちの穢れし王者につけた重く屈辱的な傷の代償は大きかった。我々は、コードの勇敢な戦士の名を祈りに乗せた。
languages.original_text: Opticon-22 and his cohort, their armour painted with black chrome, marched into the darkness of the manufactorum in silence. Hours later, we heard chilling sounds of combat, and then a flash erupted from the depths of the sacred workshops. The Emperor's Angels charged forth and found Doomscream there, crippled but still alive, and routed the fiend. His bloodied pincer, ripped off by the devastating explosion, was presented to the Lord Captain as a trophy. The body of Opticon-22 was never found — it was disintegrated by the atomic charge he carried into battle. Such was the high price for the grave and humiliating wound that he and his tech-comrades inflicted upon the unholy champion of the heretics. We chanted the name of the brave warrior of the Code in our prayers.

traits.locale_text: オプティコン-22と彼の部隊は黒いクロームメッキで塗装された鎧を身にまとい、静寂の中、聖工場の暗闇へと進軍した。数時間後、身の毛がよだつような戦闘音が聞こえ、聖なる工房の奥から閃光が走った。ようやく勇気を出して戦場を調査してみると、そこにはバラバラになった遺体と、壊滅的な爆発で引きちぎられたベイルスクリームの血まみれの鋏しかなかった。オプティコン-22の遺体は発見されなかった――彼が戦場に持ち込んだ原子爆弾の爆薬によって細かく分解してしまったのだ。彼と彼の技術者仲間たちが異端者たちの穢れた王者に与えた重大で屈辱的な傷の代償は大きかった。我々は祈りの中で、コードの勇敢な戦士の名を唱えた。

languages.text: Opticon-22 y su cohorte, con armaduras pintadas de cromo negro, marcharon en silencio a la oscuridad del manufactorum. Horas después, escuchamos los escalofriantes sonidos del combate, seguidos de un destello desde las profundidades de los talleres sagrados. Los Ángeles del Emperador cargaron y encontraron allí a Doomscream, lisiado pero aún con vida, y expulsaron a la bestia. Su tenaza ensangrentada, arrancada por la devastadora explosión, se presentó como trofeo a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán. Del cuerpo de Opticon-22 no quedaba ni rastro: fue desintegrado por la carga atómica que usó en combate. Ese fue el precio de la dolorosa y humillante herida que sus tecnocamaradas y él infligieron al blasfemo campeón de los herejes. Entonamos el nombre del valiente guerrero del código en nuestras plegarias.
languages.original_text: Opticon-22 and his cohort, their armour painted with black chrome, marched into the darkness of the manufactorum in silence. Hours later, we heard chilling sounds of combat, and then a flash erupted from the depths of the sacred workshops. The Emperor's Angels charged forth and found Doomscream there, crippled but still alive, and routed the fiend. His bloodied pincer, ripped off by the devastating explosion, was presented to the Lord Captain as a trophy. The body of Opticon-22 was never found — it was disintegrated by the atomic charge he carried into battle. Such was the high price for the grave and humiliating wound that he and his tech-comrades inflicted upon the unholy champion of the heretics. We chanted the name of the brave warrior of the Code in our prayers.

traits.locale_text: Opticon-22 y sus tropas, con armaduras pintadas de cromo negro, marcharon en silencio a la oscuridad del manufactorum. Horas después, escuchamos los escalofriantes sonidos del combate, seguidos de un destello desde las profundidades de los talleres sagrados. Cuando por fin nos armamos de valor e investigamos el campo de batalla, solo encontramos los restos ensangrentados de la tenaza de Balescream, arrancados por la devastadora explosión. Del cuerpo de Opticon-22 no quedaba ni rastro: fue desintegrado por la carga atómica que usó en combate. Ese fue el precio de la dolorosa y humillante herida que sus tecnocamaradas y él infligieron al blasfemo campeón de los herejes. Entonamos el nombre del valiente guerrero del código en nuestras plegarias.

languages.text: Opticon-22 und seine Kohorte, ihre Rüstungen mit schwarzem Chrom bemalt, marschierten schweigend in die Dunkelheit des Manufactorums. Stunden später hörten wir laute Kampfgeräusche, dann brach ein Blitz aus den Tiefen der heiligen Werkstätten hervor. Die Engel des Imperators stürmten voran und fanden Unheilsschrei – verwundet, aber am Leben – und töteten den Unhold. Seine von einer verheerenden Explosion abgetrennte blutige Schere wurde dem Lord Captain als Trophäe überreicht. Die Leiche von Opticon-22 wurde nie gefunden. Sie war durch den nuklearen Sprengsatz pulverisiert worden, den er in die Schlacht getragen hatte. Diesen hohen Preis mussten wir für die schwere und blamable Wunde bezahlen, die er und seine Techkameraden dem unheiligen Champion der Ketzer zugefügt hatten. Wir priesen den Namen des mutigen Kriegers des Kodex in unseren Gebeten.
languages.original_text: Opticon-22 and his cohort, their armour painted with black chrome, marched into the darkness of the manufactorum in silence. Hours later, we heard chilling sounds of combat, and then a flash erupted from the depths of the sacred workshops. The Emperor's Angels charged forth and found Doomscream there, crippled but still alive, and routed the fiend. His bloodied pincer, ripped off by the devastating explosion, was presented to the Lord Captain as a trophy. The body of Opticon-22 was never found — it was disintegrated by the atomic charge he carried into battle. Such was the high price for the grave and humiliating wound that he and his tech-comrades inflicted upon the unholy champion of the heretics. We chanted the name of the brave warrior of the Code in our prayers.

traits.locale_text: Opticon-22 und seine Truppe, ihre Rüstungen mit schwarzem Chrom bemalt, marschierten schweigend in die Dunkelheit des Manufactorums. Stunden später hörten wir markerschütternde Kampfgeräusche, dann brach ein Blitz aus den Tiefen der heiligen Werkstätten hervor. Als wir endlich den Mut fanden, das Schlachtfeld zu untersuchen, entdecken wir nichts als verstümmelte Überreste und Unheilsschreis blutige Schere, die von einer verheerenden Explosion abgerissen worden war. Die Leiche von Opticon-22 wurde nie gefunden. Sie war durch den nuklearen Sprengsatz eingeäschert worden, den er in die Schlacht getragen hatte. Diesen hohen Preis mussten wir für die schwere und blamable Wunde bezahlen, die er und seine Techkameraden dem unheiligen Champion der Ketzer zugefügt hatten. Wir sprachen den Namen des mutigen Code-Kriegers in unseren Gebeten.

languages.text: Zırhları siyah kroma boyanmış Opticon-22 ve taburu, ölüm sessizliği eşliğinde uygun adım manufaktorumun karanlığına yürüdü. Saatler sonra çatışmanın tüyler ürperten sesini duyduk, hemen ardından ise kutsal atölyelerin derinliklerinden bir ışık patlaması yayıldı. İmparator'un Melekleri, hücum edip Belanarası'nı buldu... Sakatlanmış olsa da hayattaydı. Melekler, zebaninin işini bitirdi. Yıkıcı patlamayla kopan kanlı kıskacı, ganimet olarak Lord Kaptan'a takdim edildi. Opticon-22'nin bedeni bulunamamış, atom patlamasının etkisiyle atomlarına ayrılmıştı. Magos ile tekno yoldaşları, kâfirlerin günahkâr müdafisine verdiği büyük ve küçük düşürücü hasar için ağır bir bedel ödemek zorunda kalmıştı. Kodun gözü pek savaşçısının adını dualarımızda andık.
languages.original_text: Opticon-22 and his cohort, their armour painted with black chrome, marched into the darkness of the manufactorum in silence. Hours later, we heard chilling sounds of combat, and then a flash erupted from the depths of the sacred workshops. The Emperor's Angels charged forth and found Doomscream there, crippled but still alive, and routed the fiend. His bloodied pincer, ripped off by the devastating explosion, was presented to the Lord Captain as a trophy. The body of Opticon-22 was never found — it was disintegrated by the atomic charge he carried into battle. Such was the high price for the grave and humiliating wound that he and his tech-comrades inflicted upon the unholy champion of the heretics. We chanted the name of the brave warrior of the Code in our prayers.
